dashboard.label: Sensor Status
dashboard.description: Provides information on each Tango Sensor

search.query: | inputlookup sensors.csv | stats first(ASN) AS "ASN" first("ASN Country") AS "Country" first("Last Active") AS Time first("Network Name") AS "Network Name" first("Sensor IP Address") AS "Sensor IP Address" first("Owner") AS "Owner" first("Owner Email") AS "Owner Email" first("Comment") AS "Comment" by "Sensor Name" | eval Time=strftime(Time,"%m/%d/%y %H:%M:%S") | rename Time as "Last Active"
sourcetype=sensor | stats count by sensorIP | fields sensorIP | iplocation prefix=iploc_ allfields=true sensorIP | geostats latfield=iploc_lat longfield=iploc_lon count by sensorIP
